title: Zodwa and Itumeleng Khune accused of being predators
text:
Zodwa and Itumeleng Khune accused of being predators share this

Footballer Itumeleng Khune found himself trending on Twitter over the weekend thanks to a short video that went viral.

In the video, the 32-year-old goalie can be seen hanging out with an 18-year-old girl by the name of Tshegofatso, believed to be the girlfriend of DJ Tira’s son, Junior Khathi.

The video was shared by Junior in a since-deleted Instagram post that read: “Loyalty over Royalty I’maa Die For Respect, I Gave You My All And This is how You Repay me??@ttshego_m Toast to The Truest Moments We Shared I Really Loved You.”
description: Footballer Itumeleng Khune found himself trending on Twitter over the weekend thanks to a short video that went viral.
